title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row gets deleted. However, instead of staying on the second row, the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, but the Launch item should remain on the second row.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the application. 2. Locate the Coolbar component. 3. Press the Delete button. 4. Notice that the first item on the second row gets deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
